rationale: The Alert component currently only has 'default' and 'destructive' variants. The codebase uses toast.success, toast.info, and toast.warning (found 50+ usages), but there's no equivalent Alert component styling for persistent inline feedback. This limits the ability to show contextual success messages or warnings within the page layout.
problemSolved: Alert component in alert.tsx only has variants: { default: 'bg-card text-card-foreground', destructive: 'text-destructive bg-card...' }. No success (green), warning (amber), or info (blue) variants exist.
